casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Respondent, v. Irving BALKAN and George Schor, Defendants-Appellants. No. 20. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Oct. 19, 1936. Abraham B. Hertz, of New York City (Nathan H. Herman, of New York City, of counsel), for appellants. Leo J. Hickey, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y. (Vine H. Smith and Frank J. Parker, Asst. U. S. Attys., both of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for the United States.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and MACK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order (13 F.Supp. 399) affirmed on the authority of In re Gregory, 219 U.S. 210, 31 S.Ct. 143, 55 L.Ed. 184, and Glasgow v. Moyer, 225 U.S. 420, 32 S.Ct. 753, 56 L.Ed. 1147.
